Readable class

Source: R/readable.R
Readable.Rd

Readable class that allows typed access to its members

Format

R6Class object.

Value

Object of R6Class.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Readable$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
